item.title: WSL Shortcuts
item.description: A while back I posted a couple of Windows productivity tips: File Explorer <> Command Prompt File Explorer > VS Code Windows Files Explorer & WSL.EXE Now that Windows SubSystem Linux is here, what if we want to drop straight from Windows File Explorer to, for example, the Ubuntu command line? So, assuming you have WSL already setup, type wsl straight into the Windows Explorer bar:
